quote: So, now I've been to see a drug counselor who told me I need to lay off the drugs and talk about my feelings, and a shrink who heard what I had to say and immediately put me on drugs.
quote_letters: SO NOW IVE BEEN TO SEE A DRUG COUNSELOR WHO TOLD ME I NEED TO LAY OFF THE DRUGS AND TALK ABOUT MY FEELINGS AND A SHRINK WHO HEARD WHAT I HAD TO SAY AND IMMEDIATELY PUT ME ON DRUGS
